on reading compounds: 媚眼秋波【ビガンシュウハ】casting a coquettish (an amorous) glance (at a man)
媚笑【ビショウ】charming, enticing smile, smile meant to catch a man's attention
kun reading compounds: 媚びる【こびる】to flatter, to curry favor with, to curry favour with, to fawn on, to butter up to, to flirt with (woman with a man), to make eyes at (a man)
